concept.title: Resources
concept.shortdesc: Other resources which help you getting started with DITA and Oxygen XML Editor.

conbody.p: For more information about getting started with DITA and how to work with DITA in Oxygen XML Editor, see our compiled collection of DITA-related webinars that are meant to help you with your journey into working with DITA: Webinars: Working with DITA in Oxygen
